text: Dangerous Summer () is a 2000 Latvian World War II drama movie directed by Aigars Grauba and starring Inese Cauna, Uldis Dumpis, Eduards Pāvuls, Jānis Reinis, Artūrs Skrastiņš. ==Other websites== * Category:2000s war movies Category:2000 drama movies Category:Latvian movies Category:World War II movies
title: Dangerous Summer
